review_data.title: Not more than average
review_data.content: Interior is without charm and multiple styles mixed. Staff has to walk through the restaurant with goods. Food was ok, but not with high quality. Some ingredients tasted like directly from the freezer. Price range a bit weird - small tomato salat (less than one...More

review_data.title: UK visitor - after a hard day at the office
review_data.content: Working in Zurich for a week. Just what I needed, a quiet setting with a great menu. I was in the mood for something simple and wholesome (I'd missed lunch running between meetings) and the minestrone soup was a good starter. Followed up by Risotto...More

review_data.title: It's hard to review anywhere in Zurich when everything's so expensive
review_data.content: This could be a review for all of Zurich's restaurants. Ok it's good food but expensive. The staff were nice but it's expensive. The location is ok but it's expensive. I left with a happy belly but an empty wallet because.. yeh you got it,...More
